title: 'Input Not Supported'
body:
So I'm trying to play a game of ARAM and once it becomes the loading screen my screen goes black with the title 'Input Not Supported' moving across it. Now, I can hear the game happening and type in the chat (obviously can't see any replies, though) and my screen remains with 'Input Not Supported'. This has never happened before until the recent update. I thought it was because I was using the Legacy Client but its the same result with Alpha, and I don't know how to fix it. If someone knows what the problem could be please let me know. 

Thanks.

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is currently a [known issue](http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/VJeqP4UK-fullscreen-issueout-of-range-issue) and a fix is in the works, however for now you can try some of the workarounds provided in the linked thread, let me know if anything helps.
